pre_caption: This close-up, overhead shot initially frames a child's hand extending from the top edge towards the center of the frame, positioned in the foreground. This container is filled with light-colored granular pieces, visible in the middle ground and background within the container. The hand remains relatively stationary in the center-top foreground.
